This countryside eco-garden features fruit orchards such as mangosteen, mango, guava, and rambutan. Visitors can enjoy fresh fruits, catch fish in the canal, row boats, cycle on wooden bridges, and try making traditional cakes. With peaceful greenery and a slow rural pace, it is a relaxing spot for those seeking authentic Mekong Delta countryside experience.

Du khách được tham quan vườn, hái và thưởng thức trái ca cao tươi, tìm hiểu quy trình làm ca cao thủ công từ ủ, rang, xay tới tạo chocolate. description_en: Muoi Cuong Cacao Farm in Phong Dien, Can Tho, features over 1.2 hectares of cacao trees with around 2,000 cacao plants of various varieties. Visitors can walk through the garden, pick cacao fruit, learn about the traditional fermentation and roasting process, and taste fresh cacao pulp and pure handmade chocolate. The peaceful green setting offers an authentic and relaxing agricultural experience.

Visitors can pick fresh fruits, enjoy sampan boat rides, try fishing, walk on monkey bridges, take countryside-themed photos, taste rustic Mekong dishes, and stay at the homestay. It is an ideal destination for families and travelers seeking authentic rural Mekong experiences.

Với diện tích khoảng 130 ha, nơi đây vẫn giữ nét hoang sơ, bình yên và gần gũi đời sống người dân miền Tây. Du khách có thể đi thuyền, dạo vườn, chèo xuồng, thưởng thức trái cây tại vườn và trải nghiệm cuộc sống nông thôn mộc mạc. description_en: Au Islet is a small island on the Hau River, known for its peaceful scenery, lush fruit gardens, and mangrove lines. Covering around 130 hectares, it offers an authentic Mekong Delta countryside experience with boat rides, garden walks, sampan rowing, and fresh fruit tasting. The islet is also home to Azerai Can Tho, a luxury nature-retreat resort surrounded by water and greenery.

Visitors can walk under lush fruit trees, row boats through small waterways, catch fish in traditional mud ponds, learn to make bánh tét (sticky rice cake), catch river prawns, and enjoy authentic Mekong cuisine. This is an ideal spot for travelers seeking a genuine and rustic Mekong rural experience.

description_en: Bang Lang Stork Sanctuary is one of the largest natural stork habitats in the Mekong Delta, located in Thot Not District, Can Tho City. Thousands of storks and various water birds gather here. At dawn and dusk, the sky fills with storks flying in flocks — a breathtaking natural scene. The entry road lined with purple Bang Lang flowers adds to the peaceful and rural charm. This destination is perfect for nature lovers, photographers, and those seeking a calm countryside experience.

A calm, leafy complex ideal for contemplative walks and architectural photography.

Located right in Ninh Kieu center opposite Ninh Kieu Wharf, it’s easy to combine with nearby attractions.

description_en: Nam Nha Pagoda is a historic temple over 120 years old, marking heritage architecture and history of Can Tho. Founded around 1895 by Nguyen Giac Nguyen and originally known as Nam Nha Duong, it is now recognized as a cultural-historical site. Situated by the Binh Thuy River opposite Binh Thuy Assembly Hall, the temple features shady grounds, a pond, curved roof-tiles and a unique blend of Chinese, French and Vietnamese architectural styles. Ideal for touring, prayer and tranquil moments in the midst of the city.

Situated beside the Hau River, the house features yin-yang roof tiles, finely carved woodwork and serves as a cultural-spiritual hub for the local community. It is both a spiritual destination and a distinctive example of Southwest Vietnamese architecture. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

description_vi: Chùa Pitu Khôsa Răngsây (chùa Viễn Quang) là ngôi chùa Khmer Nam Bộ nổi bật tại Cần Thơ, được xây dựng năm 1948 bởi Thượng tọa Sơn Tây, tọa lạc tại 27/18 Mạc Đĩnh Chi, An Cư, Ninh Kiều. Chùa sở hữu kiến trúc ba tầng lầu, mái cong kiểu Angkor, được trùng tu lớn từ 2008 đến 2012. Kiến trúc chùa nổi bật với hoa văn rồng, chim Thần Krud, phù điêu nữ thần Tép-pa-nom, phù điêu thần Hanuman… :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2} Chùa cũng là nơi lưu giữ các thư tịch cổ, bộ sách lá buông hàng trăm năm tuổi của cộng đồng Khmer. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3} Nằm ngay trung tâm thành phố Cần Thơ, chùa là điểm đến lý tưởng cho hành hương, tham quan văn hóa và chụp ảnh kiến trúc.
description_en: Pitu Khôsa Rangsay Pagoda (also known as Viễn Quang Pagoda) is a prominent Khmer Theravada Buddhist temple in Can Tho, built in 1948 and located at 27/18 Mac Dinh Chi Street, An Cu Ward, Ninh Kieu District. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4} The temple features a striking three-storey Angkor-style architecture with ornate carvings of dragons, the sacred bird Krud, goddess Tép-pa-nom, and Hanuman motifs. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5} It underwent major renovation from 2008 to 2012 and houses ancient palm-leaf manuscripts considered treasures of the Khmer community. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6} Located in the heart of Can Tho City, it is an ideal destination for pilgrimage, cultural exploration and architectural photography.

The house preserves the lifestyle of wealthy southern Vietnamese landowners and has been featured in several films, including 'The Lover' (L’Amant). description_vi: Đền thờ Hùng Vương Cần Thơ là công trình văn hóa - tâm linh quy mô lớn tại miền Tây Nam Bộ, với diện tích gần 39.000 m². Công trình mang đậm biểu tượng thời đại Hùng Vương và văn hóa Đông Sơn: khối chính vuông - tròn tượng trưng 'đất vuông trời tròn', 18 cánh cung biểu trưng 18 đời Vua Hùng và 54 cột trụ đại diện 54 dân tộc Việt Nam. Không gian rộng lớn với hồ nước, cây xanh, khu thờ tự trang nghiêm giúp du khách tìm về nguồn cội dân tộc, tri ân tổ tiên và khám phá văn hóa Việt trong khung cảnh hiện đại hòa quyện truyền thống.
description_en: Hung Kings Temple in Can Tho is a large cultural and spiritual complex in the Mekong Delta, covering nearly 39,000 m². The architecture symbolizes the Hung Kings era and Dong Son culture: a round-square main shrine representing the ancient concept 'round sky, square earth', 18 arcs for 18 Hung Kings and 54 pillars symbolizing Vietnam's 54 ethnic groups. The temple features lakes, green areas and solemn worship halls, offering visitors a serene place to honor national ancestors and explore Vietnamese cultural heritage.
